name: John Mc Wizard in: The Defence of the Great Glowing Green Orb | (GDTV Jam 2022)

description:
Patch notes (Latest: 0.2)

  • Fix for widescreen resolutions.
  • Fix for a bug relating to wave spawning.
THE LORE:

It was a peaceful day in the dimension of The Great Glowing Green Orb™, when suddenly a tear in the space-time-continuum caused a portal the Gnostril dimension to open up allowing the passage of the evil Gnose creatures to threaten the peaceful tranquillity of this land.

Only you, JOHN MCWIZARD can prevent total disaster. 

Death is only the beginning for your enemies, as you will harness their souls to create powerful towers to defend the beautiful perfection of The Great Glowing Green Orb™.

CONTROLS:
  • WASD = Movement.
  • Mouse = Look around.
  • Space = Jump.
  • Q and E = cycle through towers during build phase.
  • Left click = Hold to build towers during the build phase or shoot magic during the defence phase.
  • Right Click = Hold to sell/destroy placed towers.
  • Enter/Return key = Summon next wave of Gnoses.
OTHER STUFF:

This has been the first game jam I have ever entered, and I have to say it has been a lot of fun! This was a solo project and all of the assets were made during the duration of the jam apart from music and sound effects, which I'll link the specifics of where to find them later on as I'm in a rush :D
